constantValues: A request to supply a diet, formula feeding (eternal) or oral nutritional supplement to a patient/resident.

members.name: additiveProductName

constantValues: The product or brand name of the type of modular component to be added to the formula.

members.description: The product or brand name of the type of modular component to be added to the formula.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: additiveTypeId

constantValues: Indicates the type of modular component such as protein, carbohydrate, fat or fiber to be provided in addition to or mixed with the base formula.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Indicates the type of modular component such as protein, carbohydrate, fat or fiber to be provided in addition to or mixed with the base formula.

members.name: administrationInstruction

constantValues: Free text formula administration, feeding instructions or additional instructions or information.

members.description: Free text formula administration, feeding instructions or additional instructions or information.

members.name: baseFormulaProductName

constantValues: The product or brand name of the eternal or infant formula product such as "ACME Adult Standard Formula".

members.description: The product or brand name of the eternal or infant formula product such as "ACME Adult Standard Formula".

foreignKeyAttribute.name: baseFormulaTypeId

constantValues: The type of eternal or infant formula such as an adult standard formula with fiber or a soy-based infant formula.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The type of eternal or infant formula such as an adult standard formula with fiber or a soy-based infant formula.

members.name: caloricDensity

constantValues: The amount of energy (calories) that the formula should provide per specified volume, typically per mL or fluid oz.

members.description: The amount of energy (calories) that the formula should provide per specified volume, typically per mL or fluid oz.

members.name: dateTime

constantValues: The date and time that this nutrition order was requested.

members.description: The date and time that this nutrition order was requested.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: encounterId

constantValues: An encounter that provides additional information about the healthcare context in which this request is made.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: An encounter that provides additional information about the healthcare context in which this request is made.

members.name: maxVolumeToDeliver

constantValues: The maximum total quantity of formula that may be administered to a subject over the period of time, e.g. 1440 mL over 24 hours.

members.description: The maximum total quantity of formula that may be administered to a subject over the period of time, e.g. 1440 mL over 24 hours.

members.name: name

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.description: The name of the custom entity.

members.name: nutritionOrderNumber

constantValues: Identifiers assigned to this order by the order sender or by the order receiver.

members.description: Identifiers assigned to this order by the order sender or by the order receiver.

members.name: oralDietInstruction

constantValues: Free text or additional instructions or information pertaining to the oral diet.

members.description: Free text or additional instructions or information pertaining to the oral diet.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: ordererId

constantValues: The practitioner that holds legal responsibility for ordering the diet, nutritional supplement, or formula feedings.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The practitioner that holds legal responsibility for ordering the diet, nutritional supplement, or formula feedings.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: patientId

constantValues: The person (patient) who needs the nutrition order for an oral diet, nutritional supplement and/or eternal or formula feeding.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The person (patient) who needs the nutrition order for an oral diet, nutritional supplement and/or eternal or formula feeding.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: routeOfAdministrationId

constantValues: The route or physiological path of administration into the patient's gastrointestinal tract for purposes of providing the formula feeding, e.g. nasogastric tube.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The route or physiological path of administration into the patient's gastrointestinal tract for purposes of providing the formula feeding, e.g. nasogastric tube.

members.name: status

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: The workflow status of the nutrition order/request.

members.description: The workflow status of the nutrition order/request.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'status_display' is added to the 'NutritionOrder' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'status'
addSupportingAttribute.name: status_display

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'NutritionOrder' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

members.name: statusCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Nutrition Order

members.description: Reason for the status of the Nutrition Order

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'NutritionOrder' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

definitions.description: A request to supply a diet, formula feeding (eternal) or oral nutritional supplement to a patient/resident.
